title: Help selecting college
content:
I have given kcet and I am getting pes electronic City campus and sjce mysore (aided seat) 
Both cs 
Which one should I take?

comments.body: If u r staying in Mysore then select sjce otherwise pes is good
Same here I don't know what to choose... Are you going to wait till last round to see whether you will get cs in rr campus?
